[ library(calendar) | The ECLiPSe Libraries | Reference Manual | Alphabetic Index ]

mjd_to_jd(++MJD, ?JD)

Convert Modified Julian Dates (MJD) to Julian Dates (JD)
MJD
Integer or float
JD
Variable or float

Description

Convert Modified Julian Dates (MJD) to Julian Dates (JD). The relationship is simply JD = MJD+2400000.5
